WorkItem.Description:
Hi Tool Kit Team,
 
I am using WPF Toolkit in our project. In the WPF Data Grid when i set the user control in template columns the bindings are not updated properly.
 
Herewith i have attached the project to reproduce the same. I have an entity with 4 columns (Name, DOB, DOJ and Status). I have set this entity as my DataGrid's Items Source.
 
for the DOB i have used the template column and in the editing template i have used Date Picker Control
for the DOJ i have used the template column and in the editing template i  have used my user control (date picker with masking features).
 
If i update the date in DOB via editing template  values are getting updated back in the source and cell  but the same is not working for DOJ.
 
Please have a look at the project attached and let me know, what is the cause and resolution.
 
Thanks in Advance.
 
Regards,
Gopi V
WorkItem.Summary: User controls are not working with Template Columns
